title: Update on the latest in business - WFMZ Allentown

content:
INANCIAL MARKETS
Asian shares fall, oil gains after OPEC plus strikes deal
TOKYO (AP) Shares were mostly lower today in Asia while crude prices held steady after OPEC and other oil producing nations agreed to cut output to reflect the collapse of demand due… [+6265 chars]
